## ThirdwebSDK.getMultiwrap() method

Get an instance of a Multiwrap contract

**Signature:**

```typescript
getMultiwrap(address: string): Multiwrap;
```

## Parameters

| Parameter | Type   | Description                          |
| --------- | ------ | ------------------------------------ |
| address   | string | the address of the deployed contract |

**Returns:**

Multiwrap

the contract
